import axios from'axios';export var LOADING='LOADING';export var SUCCESS='SUCCESS';export var BTN='BTN';export var NAVIGATION='NAVIGATION';export var MODE='MODE';export var SHOW='SHOW';export var ERR='ERR';//=============================================================================/
export var getMyWork=function getMyWork(){return function(dispatch){//get my work that ill be displaying on my page
dispatch({type:LOADING});axios.get(process.env.REACT_APP_mywork).then(function(res){console.log(res);return dispatch({type:SUCCESS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);return dispatch({type:ERR,payload:err});});};};//=============================================================================/
//no dispatch throwing needed , but can be store here for good use of redux aysnc control
export var tog_description=function tog_description(id){return function(dispatch){var target=document.querySelector("#".concat(id));//--------------------------------------------
/off/i.test(target.getAttribute('class'))?target.setAttribute('class','fas fa-toggle-on'):target.setAttribute('class','fas fa-toggle-off');};};//=============================================================================/
export var changeBtnLabel=function changeBtnLabel(label){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:BTN,payload:label});};};//=============================================================================/
export var navBar=function navBar(whereTo){return function(dispatch){switch(whereTo){case'Home':window.sessionStorage.setItem('nav',whereTo);setTimeout(function(){var view='#intro';document.querySelector(view).scrollIntoView();},500);return dispatch({type:NAVIGATION,payload:whereTo});case'Projects':window.sessionStorage.setItem('nav',whereTo);setTimeout(function(){var view='#movie-card-list';document.querySelector(view).scrollIntoView();},500);return dispatch({type:NAVIGATION,payload:whereTo});default:return false;}};};//=============================================================================/
export var showOrNot=function showOrNot(choice){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:SHOW,payload:!choice});};};//=============================================================================/
export var DarkMode=function DarkMode(mode){return function(dispatch){if(mode){window.sessionStorage.setItem('toggleDarkMode',mode);return dispatch({type:MODE,payload:mode});}else{window.sessionStorage.setItem('toggleDarkMode',mode);return dispatch({type:MODE,payload:mode});}};};
